entry.title: Hirdeshprajapati311/Simpe-Notes: Notes App is a lightweight and responsive note-taking application built using React, Zustand, and Tailwind CSS. It allows users to create, edit, update, and delete notes in real-time with a clean UI and smooth state management. Designed as a logic-building project, it focuses on mastering core concepts like component structuring, state handling, co
entry.content: Notes App is a lightweight and responsive note-taking application built using React, Zustand, and Tailwind CSS. It allows users to create, edit, update, and delete notes in real-time with a clean UI and smooth state management.
